original_text: And if you walk in obedience to me and keep my decrees and commands as David your father did, I will give you a long life.”
korean_text: 네가 만일 네 아버지 다윗이 행함 같이 내 길로 행하며 내 법도와 명령을 지키면 내가 또 네 날을 길게 하리라

sentences.original_text: And if you walk in obedience to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 당신이 나에게 순종하며 걸어가면

sentences.original_text: and keep my decrees and commands
I will give you a long life.
